common.name: Name
common.temperatureHint: Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more random, while lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic.
common.seedHint: This feature is in Beta. If specified, OpenAI will make a best effort to sample deterministically, such that repeated requests with the same seed and parameters should return the same result.
common.presencePenaltyHint: Positive values penalize new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics.
common.frequencyPenaltyHint: Positive values penalize new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim.

azure-o.title: Azure OpenAI Reasoning
azure-o.description: Open AI LLM integration for reasoning Models

openai.title: OpenAI
openai.endpointHint: Base url of open ai endpoint

customPrompt.title: Prompt
customPrompt.description: Uses a free prompt text as system message.

hubPrompt.title: Hub Prompt
hubPrompt.description: Uses a prompt from the free langchain hub.

summaryPrompt.title: Summary Prompt
summaryPrompt.description: Defines the summary prompt that is used for conversation label.
summaryPrompt.promptHint: Use the {content} placeholder for the actual history.

always42.title: DEV: Add 42
always42.description: Always adds 42 to the sum of two numbers

azureSearch.title: Azure AI Search
azureSearch.description: Performs a search using Azure AI Search
azureSearch.vectorColumnHint: Name of the vector column/field. Defaults to: text_vector
azureSearch.instructionsHint: A description of the tool including instructions for the model on how to use it.
azureSearch.topKHint: The number of results to return. Defaults to 10.

bing.title: Bing Web Search
bing.description: Performs a web search using Bing

azureDalle.title: Azure Dall-E
azureDalle.description: Generates images with the Azure DALL-E image generator.

dalle.title: Dall-E
dalle.description: Generates images with the DALL-E image generator.
dalle.styleHint: The style of the generated images. Must be one of vivid or natural. Vivid causes the model to lean towards generating hyper-real and dramatic images. Natural causes the model to produce more natural, less hyper-real looking images.
dalle.qualityHint: The quality of the image that will be generated. hd creates images with finer details and greater consistency across the image.
dalle.sizeHint: The size of the generated image. Must be one of 256x256, 512x512, or 1024x1024 for DALL·E-2 models. Must be one of 1024x1024, 1792x1024, or 1024x1792 for DALL·E-3 models.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: Evaluators mathematical expressions based on text input

files.title: Search Files
files.description: Enables the LLM to  search files in a general bucket or uploaded by the user via the right side panel.
files.descriptionHint: Describes the tool and the data in the index.
files.takeHint: The number of results to return.
files.filesInChatHint: Upload files into a conversation. Files will be available only in the conversation where they were uploaded. 'Take' value will be ignored
files.errorFileTooLarge: The file is larger than allowed for this file type.
files.errorNotSupportedFileTypeImage: Uploading images (.jpeg, .png) is not yet supported, but is planned.
files.errorOutdatedFileType: Outdated format. Please save the document in {format}-format and upload it again.
files.errorREISConfiguration: Technical error. Apparantly there is a configuration error. Please inform an administrator.
files.errorSearchingFile: Technical error. Please inform an administrator.
files.errorUploadingFile: Technical error. Please inform an administrator.
files.errorUploadingFileDamaged: Technical error. The file seems to be damaged.
files.errorUploadingREISConfiguration: The uploaded file could not be processed due to a faulty configuration. Please inform an administrator.

whole-files.title: Complete Files
whole-files.description: Adds the complete content of files uploaded via the paperclip to a conversation to the LLM context.
whole-files.fileSizeLimitHint: Files larger than this will be rejected before uploading.

openapi.title: Open API
openapi.description: Connects an external, standardized API as tool.
openapi.headersHint: One header per line as Key=Value

simpleInput.title: DEV: Simple Input
simpleInput.description: Asks for input from the user

speechToText.title: Speech To Text
speechToText.description: Allows speech input via microphone icon

filesInConversation.title: Search Files in Chat
filesInConversation.description: Enables the LLM to search files uploaded via the paperclip to a conversation.
filesInConversation.maxFilesHint: Maximum number of files to upload in a conversation

filesVision.title: Files Vision
filesVision.maxFilesHint: Maximum number of images to upload in a conversation

googleGenai.title: Google GenAI
googleGenai.topKHint: A top-k of 1 means the selected token is the most probable among all tokens in the model’s vocabulary (also called greedy decoding), while a top-k of 3 means that the next token is selected from among the 3 most probable tokens (using temperature).
googleGenai.topPHint:
Tokens are selected from most probable to least until the sum of their probabilities equals the top-p value.
For example, if tokens A, B, and C have a probability of .3, .2, and .1 and the top-p value is .5, then the model will select either A or B as the next token (using temperature).

bedrock.title: Amazon Bedrock
bedrock.topPHint:
Tokens are selected from the most probable to the least probable until the sum of their probabilities equals the Top-p value.
Example: If tokens A, B, and C have probabilities of 0.3, 0.2, and 0.1, and the Top-p value is 0.5, then the model will choose either A or B as the next token (using temperature).

mcpTools.title: MCP Tools
mcpTools.serverNameHint: Name of the server used for display in the chat.
mcpTools.transportHint: Transport protocol used for communication with the server.
mcpTools.endpointHint: Endpoint of the MCP server as URL.
mcpTools.enabledHint: When enabled, the tool can be called via prompt.
mcpTools.sourceHint: Defines where the value should be defined.
mcpTools.valueHint: Value that is used during tool call
mcpTools.errorToolCall: An error occurred during the tool call '{tool}'

chat.errorConfigurationUsed: Assistant is used by at least one conversation.
chat.errorContentFilter: The question was rejected by the system due to its content and is therefore not answered.
chat.errorContextLengthExceeded: The context of the current chat is too long for the used LLM. Either there is too much text in this chat or you uploaded a too large file with the "Complete File" extension.
chat.errorStringAboveMaxLength: The request to the LLM is too long. Either there is too much text in this chat or you uploaded a too large file with the "Complete File" extension.
chat.errorFailedToolUse: The LLM did not use the tool correctly. This might be solved by using a better LLM.
chat.errorMissingLLM: No llm has been configured yet. Please configure an extension
chat.errorMissingPrompt: No prompt has been configured yet. Please configure an extension
